speaker: doctor
text: Good morning. Please, have a seat. How are you feeling today?

speaker: player
text: I've been having some strange symptoms lately. I'm not sure what's happening to me.

speaker: doctor
text: I see. Can you describe these symptoms in more detail? When did they start?

speaker: player
text: It started a few days ago. I've been seeing things... things that shouldn't be there.

speaker: doctor
text: Hallucinations can be concerning. Have you been under any stress lately?

speaker: player
text: Yes, I haven't been sleeping well. And there's been a lot of pressure at work.

speaker: doctor
text: Understood. Let's run some tests to rule out any physical causes.

speaker: player
text: Thank you, doctor. I really appreciate your help.

speaker: doctor
text: You're welcome. Don't hesitate to contact me if the symptoms persist.
